Lyric:
[by:那些年这些年]
[00:16.83]Would you help me to find a new way
[00:21.31]Would you guide me through all this again
[00:26.07]Don't let me slip away
[00:29.93]I need you here till the very end
[00:34.65]So stay here with me
[00:38.28]There's so much love in you're smile when i look at your face
[00:42.65]And i'm here to stay
[00:46.82]You're my first and my last loving
[00:49.92]You're my escape

[00:51.83]So tell me you'll be right here with me
[00:55.63]Hearing your voice is like hearing an angel sing
[00:59.65]Through the good and bad and all in between
[01:03.95]You're the one i want and the one i need
[01:08.37]And i know
[01:15.85]
[01:25.68]You taught me to live each day
[01:29.85]To live each day like it's my last
[01:34.22]I won't make you turn away
[01:38.36]So come with me and never look back
[01:42.86]After all that we've been through
[01:46.67]You are still by my side and i'm grateful you're there and I, I love you
[01:55.24]You're my best friend and i want you to know i care
[02:00.16]So tell me you'll be right here with me
[02:03.73]Hearing your voice is like hearing an angel sing
[02:07.99]Through the good and bad and all in between
[02:12.18]You're the one i want and the one i need
[02:16.63]And i know
[02:21.21]
[02:33.87]So this is how we planned it knowing we won't be alone
[02:42.46]And this is how it's supposed to be when you knew it all along
[02:51.28]So tell me you'll be right here with me
[02:55.00]Hearing your voice is like hearing an angel sing
[02:59.25]Through the good and bad and all in between
[03:03.31]You're the one i want and the one i need

[03:09.16]So tell me you'll be right here with me
[03:12.97]Hearing your voice is like hearing an angel sing
[03:17.05]Through the good and bad and all in between
[03:21.29]You're the one i want and the one i need
[03:25.68]And i know
[03:27.94]And i know
[03:32.21]And i know
